userStories.question: What tip would you give someone like me who was just diagnosed?
userStories.tip: Find your 'support' person for help w grocery, driving and such.  For now, focus on accepting this new you ~ same heart & soul; just sleepier!! Xo

condition.description:
Narcolepsy is a chronic sleep disorder that causes people to have excessive sleepiness and sudden attacks of sleep during the daytime. Researchers don't know exactly what causes narcolepsy, but it has to do with the balance of chemicals in your brain, and it can run in families. Symptoms include

  • Extreme daytime sleepiness, including sudden attacks of sleep
  • Cataplexy: Sudden, temporary muscle weakness or paralysis caused by strong emotions like anger, laughter, and surprise
  • Hallucinations while you fall asleep or wake up
  • Sleep paralysis, or the inability to move while you fall asleep or wake up

Narcolepsy is diagnosed by sleep studies and EEG, which measures the electrical activity of your brain. Medications and lifestyle changes, such as exercising, good sleep habits, and avoiding caffeine and alcohol, can keep symptoms under control.
condition.name: Narcolepsy
symptoms: Extreme daytime sleepiness, including sudden attacks of sleep
Cataplexy: Sudden, temporary muscle weakness or paralysis caused by strong emotions like anger, laughter, and surprise
Hallucinations while you fall asleep or wake up
Sleep paralysis, or the inability to move while you fall asleep or wake up

carousel_items: Can cause blurry vision, loss of appetite, weight loss, headache, dry mouth, or anxious feelings.
Don't take it with alcohol or drugs.
Can cause trouble sleeping, so don't take it too close to bedtime.
If using the extended-release version, the first dose is best taken right after waking up in the morning.
Capsules can be opened and sprinkled on applesauce, which can then be swallowed without chewing.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Adderall is an amphetamine stimulant. Researchers don't know exactly how it works for ADHD, but it increases norepinephrine and dopamine activity in the brain, which affects attention and behavior.
basics.bottom_line: Adderall is a first-choice treatment for ADHD that's available as a generic, but it's a stimulant, so it can cause insomnia and other side effects.
downsides: Has to be taken in the morning and early afternoon, otherwise it can cause insomnia.
It's a controlled medication and should be locked up to prevent potential abuse.
Not safe for people with a history of heart problems.
For schooled-aged children, the second dose will likely need to be given at school.

downsides_processed.orig: Has to be taken in the morning and early afternoon, otherwise it can cause insomnia.
It's a controlled medication and should be locked up to prevent potential abuse.
Not safe for people with a history of heart problems.
For schooled-aged children, the second dose will likely need to be given at school.

upsides: First-choice medication to treat ADHD.
Adderall is used in combination with counseling or other non-drug therapies to treat ADHD.
Available as a generic medication.
Available in both immediate and extended release forms.
The capsules can be opened, mixed in a spoonful of applesauce, and swallowed if you can't swallow the whole capsules.

userStories.tip: take exactly per your doctor's orders, timing and dosage are key. See a psychiatrist, not a general doc or internist if you are experiencing snything less than complete satisfaction.
This website is stupid
This website is nonsense

If you are a coffee drinker I recommend starting decaf. It will leave you jittery and clenching your jaws. 

It's not just a miracle drug..you've gotta be willing to put the effort in to change yourself, your habits, and push yourself.
Don't take it past 8pm unless you're planning a bender!
I tried Vyvance and Concerta but neither did anything. Adderall has helped me quite a bit.
You've got to regulate your doses at a therapeutic level.
For me, it is very necessary to eat a big meal before my dose or else it will be near impossible to eat a full meal for the duration of the day

Be sure to drink lots of water, and eat lots of calorie-dense foods. Useful though it is, Adderall might make you forget to eat (like it did me, whenever I changed my dosage) and that can mean trouble.
Make sure you remember to eat!
Don't just stop taking it.

Eat well and don't take it late at night.  It took me two years of making that same mistake to finally realize that was the reason it was losing most of its effectiveness and not because of tolerance.
There is such a thing as too much. My brain feels constantly fried.
Make sure you eat, and eat well.  Also exercise if you have time it'll help you sleep better at night regardless.
Fish oil supplements have helped my dry mouth. Limiting caffeine intake has increased effectiveness.

This med caused decreased appetite, commodore acne, and severe insomnia in me. It disrupted my sleep cycle and ruined my ability to receive restorative sleep. Also causes terrible dry mouth and increased agitation.
I would like to know if it causes any damage to the adrenal system.
Changed my life, before I could never stay "on task".  After I started taking Adderall, I completed college successfully, and have been more successful in work.
I wish I had known that over time I would build up a tolerance to adderall.
A guide for how to manage the dosing, if you're on it for more than 1 year. Additionally take before food, never after 4PM. Also, diet has a huge impact. http://reddit.com/r/adhd for more tips
I would have started taking it sooner if I had known how well it works

userStories.identifier: Student with a lot of classes
userStories.tip: Only take it with a prescription and take it in the mornings.

The tablet is designed to be split in quarters. Start slowly and titrate up to an effective level. I take one Adderal 1st thing, then Vyvanse when I get to work, then maybe one or part of one mid morning. I am a metabolizer.
Monitor your caffeine intake because in combo with Adderall it can make you jittery or anxious. And try to leave several hours for it to get out of your system before bedtime.
Morning with meals helps decrease the side effects, of course this is subject and every person is differnt.
Find the right dosage and stick with it - don't take it "as needed." Expect some sleeping hassles, and watch your diet.

I have severe ADHD, my Adderall helps me immensely with my day-to-day work. I still have an appetite and it doesn't effect my sleeping unless I take it in the late afternoon. Overall I think it helps someone a lot with diagnosed ADHD.

drugs.name: Adderall

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause blurry vision, loss of appetite, weight loss, headache, dry mouth, or anxious feelings.
Don't take it with alcohol or drugs.
Can cause trouble sleeping, so don't take it too close to bedtime.
If using the extended-release version, the first dose is best taken right after waking up in the morning.
Capsules can be opened and sprinkled on applesauce, which can then be swallowed without chewing.

risks_warnings.title: Serious or life-threatening cardiovascular events
risks_warnings.description: Adderall has been associated with heart attack, stroke, and sudden death. Anyone with a history of heart problems shouldn't take it, and people should be screened for heart problems before starting it. Watch out for unexplained fainting or chest pain that comes on with physical activity.

description_processed.orig: Adderall has been associated with heart attack, stroke, and sudden death. Anyone with a history of heart problems shouldn't take it, and people should be screened for heart problems before starting it. Watch out for unexplained fainting or chest pain that comes on with physical activity.

risks_warnings.title: Dependence and abuse
risks_warnings.description: Adderall has a risk of abuse and dependence. Take only what's prescribed by a doctor to minimize risks of abuse and overdose. People with a history of drug abuse shouldn't take it.
risk_factors: Taking more than the prescribed dose

description_processed.orig: Adderall has a risk of abuse and dependence. Take only what's prescribed by a doctor to minimize risks of abuse and overdose. People with a history of drug abuse shouldn't take it.

risks_warnings.title: High blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: Heart problems or high blood pressure can worsen while using Adderall. Monitor your blood pressure regularly.

description_processed.orig: Heart problems or high blood pressure can worsen while using Adderall. Monitor your blood pressure regularly.

risks_warnings.title: Aggressive behavior and psychosis
risks_warnings.description: Taking a stimulant like Adderall may worsen or bring on psychiatric symptoms such as hallucinations, delusional thinking, and mania. It may also worsen or bring on aggressive behavior or hostility.

description_processed.orig: Taking a stimulant like Adderall may worsen or bring on psychiatric symptoms such as hallucinations, delusional thinking, and mania. It may also worsen or bring on aggressive behavior or hostility.

risks_warnings.title: Driving impairment
risks_warnings.description: Adderall impairs thinking abilities (concentration, alertness) and physical abilities (reflexes, motor skills) needed to drive a car, operate machinery, or participate in potentially dangerous activities. Be careful.

description_processed.orig: Adderall impairs thinking abilities (concentration, alertness) and physical abilities (reflexes, motor skills) needed to drive a car, operate machinery, or participate in potentially dangerous activities. Be careful.

risks_warnings.title: Long-term growth suppression
risks_warnings.description: Appetite suppression may occur. In clinical studies, long-term treatment with stimulants similar to Adderall caused a temporary slowing of growth rate (both height and weight) in children ages seven to ten years. Doctors should monitor children's growth during treatment.

description_processed.orig: Appetite suppression may occur. In clinical studies, long-term treatment with stimulants similar to Adderall caused a temporary slowing of growth rate (both height and weight) in children ages seven to ten years. Doctors should monitor children's growth during treatment.

carousel_items: Take your last dose before early afternoon, otherwise you won't be able to sleep.
Don't take with fruit juice or vitamin C, because they'll lower the amount of Dextroamphetamine that gets into your body.
Can affect your concentration, so don't drive or do anything that requires concentration until you know how your body reacts to it.
If you've been taking Dextroamphetamine for a while and decide to stop it, you'll experience withdrawal symptoms if you stop it too fast.
Can cause reduced appetite, insomnia, and restlessness.

basics.benefits_moa: Dextroamphetamine is a stimulant. It treats narcolepsy and attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) by increasing norepinephrine and dopamine activity in the brain.
basics.bottom_line: Dextroamphetamine is an effective and cheap medication used to treat ADHD, but it can be habit-forming and is not used for long-term treatment.
downsides: Fruit juice lowers the amount of Dextroamphetamine that gets into your body.
If you want to stop taking Dextroamphetamine, you have to talk to your doctor since stopping cold turkey can cause withdrawal symptoms.
Dextroamphetamine is usually not used long-term since it can be habit-forming.

downsides_processed.orig: Fruit juice lowers the amount of Dextroamphetamine that gets into your body.
If you want to stop taking Dextroamphetamine, you have to talk to your doctor since stopping cold turkey can cause withdrawal symptoms.
Dextroamphetamine is usually not used long-term since it can be habit-forming.

upsides: Recommended as a first-choice medication to treat ADHD in both adults and children.
Available as a generic, so it is cheaper than other medications used to treat ADHD.
Available in an immediate release and extended release form, which allows for once or twice a day dosing.

upsides_processed.orig: Recommended as a first-choice medication to treat ADHD in both adults and children.
Available as a generic, so it is cheaper than other medications used to treat ADHD.
Available in an immediate release and extended release form, which allows for once or twice a day dosing.

drugs.one_liner: Helps you stay awake and focus.

userStories.tip: make sure to eat throught the day even if you don't feel hungry. you will definitely lose weight taking this medication if you dont eat regularly
have some ativan on hand, as it does increase already existing anxiety quite a lot
With excessive daytime sleepiness, my tolerance builds up fast. It works great till the minute it wears off and I'm sleeping in public. Frequent low-mid dosing works for me.

Dexedrine/dextroamphetamine makes up 75% of adderall, provides mental clarity. Dexedrine is free of levoamphetamine, removing the majority of the physical side effects in Adderall (muscle tension, etc.(
It causes dry mouth and dry skin, so you'll need to keep water with you, use lip balm, and moisturise.
It is similar to Adderall but is less effective yet less side effects: there is no (or little) body "wake up" to dextro, so it can feel as though your brain is pulling your body along.
Don't take it too late.

description_processed.orig: Dextroamphetamine has a risk of abuse and dependence. Take only what's prescribed by a doctor to minimize risks of abuse and overdose. People with a history of drug abuse shouldn't take it.

risks_warnings.title: Aggressive behavior and psychosis
risks_warnings.description: Taking a stimulant like Dextroamphetamine can worsen or bring on psychiatric symptoms such as hallucinations, delusional thinking, and mania. It may also worsen or bring on aggressive behavior or hostility.

description_processed.orig: Taking a stimulant like Dextroamphetamine can worsen or bring on psychiatric symptoms such as hallucinations, delusional thinking, and mania. It may also worsen or bring on aggressive behavior or hostility.

risks_warnings.title: Long-term growth suppression
risks_warnings.description: Appetite suppression can occur. In clinical studies, long-term treatment with stimulants similar to Dextroamphetamine caused a temporary slowing of growth rate (both height and weight) in children who started the medication before they started puberty. Doctors should monitor children's growth during treatment.

description_processed.orig: Appetite suppression can occur. Doctors should monitor children's growth during treatment.

risks_warnings.title: Seizures
risks_warnings.description: Dextroamphetamine can lower the brain's threshold for seizures in people with certain risk factors. Use with caution.

description_processed.orig: Dextroamphetamine can lower the brain's threshold for seizures in people with certain risk factors. Use with caution.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to fetus
risks_warnings.description: Dextroamphetamine can cause harm to your unborn baby and should only be used if the benefit is greater than the risk. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications and don't use if you're breastfeeding.

description_processed.orig: Dextroamphetamine can cause harm to your unborn baby and should only be used if the benefit is greater than the risk. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications and don't use if you're breastfeeding.

risks_warnings.title: Drug interactions
risks_warnings.description: Taking Dextroamphetamine when you've recently stopped taking monoamine oxidase inhibitors within the last two weeks can cause your blood pressure to rise very high. Go to the emergency room or talk to your doctor immediately if you feel dizzy or faint or have an extremely bad headache.

description_processed.orig: Taking Dextroamphetamine when you've recently stopped taking monoamine oxidase inhibitors within the last two weeks can cause your blood pressure to rise very high. Go to the emergency room or talk to your doctor immediately if you feel dizzy or faint or have an extremely bad headache.

carousel_items: If using for shift work sleep disorder (SWSD), take Nuvigil about an hour before the start of your shift.
Taking caffeine with Nuvigil can make you feel nervous, shaky, and will raise your heartbeat.
If you've been taking Nuvigil for a while and decide to stop it, you'll experience withdrawal symptoms if you stop it too fast.
Tell your doctor right away if you break out in a rash.
Don't drink alcohol with Nuvigil.

basics.benefits_moa: Nuvigil is a stimulant that helps you feel awake by affecting neurotransmitters in the brain.
basics.bottom_line: Nuvigil is effective in improving alertness, but it can interact with other medications and shouldn't be used long-term.
downsides: Nuvigil can be habit-forming, so it's typically not used for long-term treatment.
Interacts with many other medications.
Reduces the effectiveness of birth control pills. You need to use an additional contraceptive method while taking Nuvigil.
Nuvigil is processed in the liver so it's not a good choice if you have liver, or even kidney, problems.
Not available as a generic.

downsides_processed.orig: Nuvigil can be habit-forming, so it's typically not used for long-term treatment.
Interacts with many other medications.
Reduces the effectiveness of birth control pills. You need to use an additional contraceptive method while taking Nuvigil.
Nuvigil is processed in the liver so it's not a good choice if you have liver, or even kidney, problems.
Not available as a generic.

upsides: Effective in treating excess sleepiness in shift work sleep disorder (SWSD).
Doesn't negatively affect daytime sleep.
It's a non-amphetamine medication that helps improve alertness.

upsides_processed.orig: Effective in treating excess sleepiness in shift work sleep disorder (SWSD).
Doesn't negatively affect daytime sleep.
It's a non-amphetamine medication that helps improve alertness.

drugs.name: Nuvigil

carousel_items_processed.orig: If using for shift work sleep disorder (SWSD), take Nuvigil about an hour before the start of your shift.
Taking caffeine with Nuvigil can make you feel nervous, shaky, and will raise your heartbeat.
If you've been taking Nuvigil for a while and decide to stop it, you'll experience withdrawal symptoms if you stop it too fast.
Tell your doctor right away if you break out in a rash.
Don't drink alcohol with Nuvigil.

risks_warnings.title: Driving impairment
risks_warnings.description: Nuvigil lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful and avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.
risk_factors: Taking other medicines that make you less alert

description_processed.orig: Nuvigil lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful and avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.

risks_warnings.title: Serious allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Nuvigil can cause serious allergic reactions and life-threatening organ failure. Report any skin rash, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Nuvigil can cause serious allergic reactions and life-threatening organ failure. Report any skin rash, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Serious allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: Severe and possibly fatal reactions (e.g. Stevens-Johnson syndrome, toxic epidermal necrolysis) can happen anytime and as early as the first day while taking Nuvigil. Tell your doctor or get medical help right away if you notice sores or fluid-filled blisters on your skin, lips, or inside your mouth or peeling skin that's painful.

description_processed.orig: Severe and possibly fatal reactions (e.g. Stevens-Johnson syndrome, toxic epidermal necrolysis) can happen anytime and as early as the first day while taking Nuvigil. Tell your doctor or get medical help right away if you notice sores or fluid-filled blisters on your skin, lips, or inside your mouth or peeling skin that's painful.

risks_warnings.title: Increased side effects
risks_warnings.description: Nuvigil is processed by the kidney and liver. If you have kidney or liver problems, you may need a different dose, or other medication, to prevent increased risk of side effects.

description_processed.orig: Nuvigil is processed by the kidney and liver. If you have kidney or liver problems, you may need a different dose, or other medication, to prevent increased risk of side effects.

risks_warnings.title: Heart problems
risks_warnings.description: Nuvigil is not recommended in people with a history of heart problems. If you have a history of cardiovascular disease, talk to your doctor before use.

description_processed.orig: Nuvigil is not recommended in people with a history of heart problems. If you have a history of cardiovascular disease, talk to your doctor before use.

risks_warnings.title: Suicidal thoughts or behavior | Mania
risks_warnings.description: Nuvigil can increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Nuvigil can increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

carousel_items: Take Provigil about an hour before you need to be fully alert.
Taking caffeine with Provigil can cause you to feel nervous, shaky, and have a faster heartbeat. Try limiting your caffeine intake.
Until you know how Provigil makes you feel, don't drive or perform any tasks that need you to be alert.
You can experience withdrawal symptoms if you suddenly stop taking Provigil. Talk to your doctor before making any changes.
Tell your doctor right away if you break out in a rash.
Don't drink alcohol with Provigil.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Provigil is a stimulant that helps you feel awake. Researchers don't know exactly how Provigil works, but it probably affects chemicals (neurotransmitters) in the brain.
basics.bottom_line: Provigil is effective in improving alertness, but it can interact with other medicines and shouldn't be used long-term.
downsides: Provigil can be habit-forming, so it's typically not used for long-term treatment.
Interacts with many other medications.
Taking Provigil will make hormonal birth control less effective. You should definitely use additional forms of non-hormonal contraception.
Not a good choice if you have liver or kidney problems.

downsides_processed.orig: Provigil can be habit-forming, so it's typically not used for long-term treatment.
Interacts with many other medications.
Taking Provigil will make hormonal birth control less effective. You should definitely use additional forms of non-hormonal contraception.
Not a good choice if you have liver or kidney problems.

upsides: It's a non-amphetamine medicine that helps improve alertness.
Available in a generic version.
Effective in reducing excessive sleepiness in Shift-work Sleep Disorder.
Doesn't negatively affect daytime sleep.

userStories.tip:
Hospice is wanting me to change Provigil. To ritalin.  
I was put on this medicine for narcolepsy.  They are saying that ritalin is or will be safer concerning my heart disease.
It's controlled so dont forget your id.

userStories.identifier: Ftn w/ double depression w/ fatigue
userStories.tip: Need ID to fill Rx because it's controlled.
I got a little irritable.

userStories.identifier: Parent, fun time employee, MS 25+ years
userStories.tip: Never go off of this all of a sudden.  Works well in combo with Ampyra.
start with small doses (80-100mg) you really don't need much to achieve a noticeable benefit
Stepping down the dose paradoxically made it work better after your body gets used to the regular dose. Very very effective drug for staying awake with few side effects. Truly remarkable.

Needs to be taken daily to maintain a stable amount in your system. I get headaches the first day or two, but none after then. (Also, I'm a bit jittery the first day on too) You won't notice its impact until you have to go a day without it!
Provigil is simply the most effective focus drug in existence.

userStories.indication: Excessive daytime sleepiness associate with sleep apnea
userStories.tip: Take as needed. Tend to develop dry mouth. Effect good for ~6hrs

drugs.name: Provigil

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take Provigil about an hour before you need to be fully alert.
Taking caffeine with Provigil can cause you to feel nervous, shaky, and have a faster heartbeat. Try limiting your caffeine intake.
Until you know how Provigil makes you feel, don't drive or perform any tasks that need you to be alert.
You can experience withdrawal symptoms if you suddenly stop taking Provigil. Talk to your doctor before making any changes.
Tell your doctor right away if you break out in a rash.
Don't drink alcohol with Provigil.

risks_warnings.title: Driving impairment
risks_warnings.description: Provigil lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.
risk_factors: Taking other medicines that make you less alert

description_processed.orig: Provigil lowers your ability to focus, think, and react. Be careful. Avoid activities that require you to be alert, such as driving a car or operating machinery, until you know how this medication affects you.

risks_warnings.title: Serious allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Provigil can cause serious allergic reactions and life-threatening organ failure. Report any skin rash, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Provigil can cause serious allergic reactions and life-threatening organ failure. Report any skin rash, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Serious allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: Severe and possibly fatal reactions (e.g. Stevens-Johnson syndrome, toxic epidermal necrolysis) can happen anytime and as early as the first day while taking Provigil. Tell your doctor or get medical help right away if you notice sores or fluid-filled blisters on your skin, lips, or inside your mouth. You won't be able to re-start Provigil after this reaction.

description_processed.orig: Severe and possibly fatal reactions (e.g. Stevens-Johnson syndrome, toxic epidermal necrolysis) can happen anytime and as early as the first day while taking Provigil. Tell your doctor or get medical help right away if you notice sores or fluid-filled blisters on your skin, lips, or inside your mouth. You won't be able to re-start Provigil after this reaction.

risks_warnings.title: Increased side effects
risks_warnings.description: Provigil is broken down by the kidney and liver. If you have kidney or liver problems, you may need to use a lower dose to prevent more side effects.

description_processed.orig: Provigil is broken down by the kidney and liver. If you have kidney or liver problems, you may need to use a lower dose to prevent more side effects.

risks_warnings.title: Heart problems
risks_warnings.description: Provigil is not recommended in people with a history of heart problems. If you have a history of heart disease, talk to your doctor first.

description_processed.orig: Provigil is not recommended in people with a history of heart problems. If you have a history of heart disease, talk to your doctor first.

risks_warnings.title: Suicidal thoughts or behavior | Mania
risks_warnings.description: Provigil can increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose you are taking changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor.

description_processed.orig: Provigil can increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose you are taking changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor.

carousel_items: Since it comes in many different forms, there are different requirements for how to take or use each type. Make sure you know how to take the one you have.
Store Ritalin in a locked area to prevent abuse.
Take it early in the morning to prevent insomnia later that night.
It can cause changes in your mood.
Can raise your blood pressure and pulse, so it's not safe for people with heart problems.
Don't take it with alcohol or drugs.

clock.tip: Take 30 to 45 minutes before a meal.

basics.benefits_moa: Ritalin is a stimulant. Researchers don't know exactly how it works for ADHD, but it increases norepinephrine and dopamine activity in the brain, which affects attention and behavior.
basics.bottom_line: Ritalin is a first-choice treatment for ADHD. It comes in many different forms and is also available as a generic. That said, the immediate-release form needs to be taken more frequently than other alternatives.
downsides: The immediate-release form needs to be taken two or three times a day.
After taking Concerta, the tablet shell can be seen in your stool, but don't be concerned since the medication was still absorbed by your body.
The second or third dose needs be taken by early afternoon, otherwise insomnia can affect you that night.
Patients should avoid alcohol since it'll cause worse side effects from Ritalin.
It's a controlled medication and should be locked up to prevent potential abuse.

downsides_processed.orig: The immediate-release form needs to be taken two or three times a day.
After taking Concerta, the tablet shell can be seen in your stool, but don't be concerned since the medication was still absorbed by your body.
The second or third dose needs be taken by early afternoon, otherwise insomnia can affect you that night.
Patients should avoid alcohol since it'll cause worse side effects from Ritalin.
It's a controlled medication and should be locked up to prevent potential abuse.

upsides: First-choice medication to treat ADHD.
Ritalin is used in combination with counseling or other non-drug therapies to treat ADHD.
Available as a generic medication.
Available in many different forms: extended-release and immediate-release oral tablets, chewable immediate-release tablets, liquid, suspension, and skin patches.
Capsules can be opened and sprinkled in water or applesauce for people who don't like swallowing pills.

upsides_processed.orig: First-choice medication to treat ADHD.
Ritalin is used in combination with counseling or other non-drug therapies to treat ADHD.
Available as a generic medication.
Available in many different forms: extended-release and immediate-release oral tablets, chewable immediate-release tablets, liquid, suspension, and skin patches.
Capsules can be opened and sprinkled in water or applesauce for people who don't like swallowing pills.

drugs.one_liner: Helps you focus and stay alert.

userStories.tip: I had to take frequent high doses (20mg 5x day) so as to not fall asleep during the day. It worked but caused me to feel aggressive and somewhat suicidal. Best if taken with another med in lower doses.

userStories.identifier: Office worker, past depression and anxie
userStories.tip:
You need to take it early, with food. 

I find for best effect, take it as soon as you wake up, quickly followed by a breakfast with slow digesting carbohydrates, such as porridge, cereals or toast. It helps it release into the body gently
Far less effective if you haven't had a good sleep the night before.

userStories.identifier: Mom of an awesome 8 year old-with ADHD
userStories.tip: Eat protein before you take this to ensure your body has the fuel it needs considering your appetite will decrease. Son has no sleep problems and is very tall for his age. Does not take when out of school. The therapy he receives helps too.
If you have any heart problems, they will become more prominent. My heart palpitations increase significantly when taking Ritalin, which I hate.

Ritalin enables me to focus and concentrate without getting exhausted. I take up to 50mg daily over the day. Long term user-10 years plus. still works effectively now as it did then except when sleep deprived-then it's totally ineffective

userStories.identifier: ADHD with panic and anxiety disorder
userStories.tip: I started with 5 mg in the morning and 5mg mid day for the first week. Didn't really feel much so my psych allowed me to increase it to 10mg in morning and 10mg mid day. It worked ok but I felt more of the physiological effects. Tingling arm.

userStories.identifier: Female also Rheumatoid Arthritis and ADD
userStories.tip: I'm taking the generic brand. So far, no negative side effects. It helps with my chronic mental/physical fatigue and gives me the "willpower" to do my daily activities.

**FOR CONCERTA/EXTENDED RELEASE**
It will wear off in approximately 7-8 hours, so talk to your doctor if you have an after-school job or similar issues, as they may be able to prescribe a low-dosage non-ER tablet as a "booster".
Can't take naps while on it. Decreased hunger so when it wears off in the evening you can be more hungry than you were for lunch.
Don't take it too late or else it will keep you from sleeping or taking a nap.
Try Concerta (24h Ritalin) and/or Provigil and/or Vivance instead
Know that it might stunt the growth of children, so they should take weekends and vacations off. Also, it can become less effective over time as your body gets used to it

I wish it educates my brain to work without it.
I've had the feelling I was waking up to life after a long coma.
question: will the effect last? will I have to take it for life? is it possible anyway?

I feel it works much better when I practice my sport(running) routine. before precription I couldn't do anything and needed to sleep during the day. now I can handle all papers, letters and manage to DO anything planned. I've been on Methyphe. for about 3 months.

PLEASE THINK TWICE ABOUT TAKING THIS. I took it for 3 months and had to increase. The crash each day was so bad, that I felt like I had the worst FLU ever. When I ran out days early, I was parayalized beyond imagination with FATIGUE!!!
Do not take more than the prescribed amount
Never take more than the prescribed amount
If I am feeling irritable prior to taking, it will exacerbate that  feeling. I can be overpowering in effect.
Watch out for headaches. Ibuprofen and/or ice pack can help.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping

userStories.identifier: out of shape, but dedicated walker
userStories.tip: Skip a day or two once in a while to remind yourself how bad the fog was... you're not becoming tolerant, you've forgotten how bad life was without the stuff.

userStories.identifier: ADD young adult struggling w/ discipline

userStories.tip: I don't take the slow release and find the dose much more managable. Working with ADHD I take in the am right when I get up, in the pm I set 2 alarms one to take my pills (5 hours after AM pills) and then 30mins later so I remember to eat
I found that consumption of caffeine while on Concerta, greatly intensified anxiety so just be careful with how much caffeine you take while taking concerta.
Take in the morning; don't drink alcohol, or strongly caffeinated drinks.
userStories.identifier: Fit, hard working woman with hypothyroid

userStories.tip: Ritalin helps me relax, believe it or not. If I am stressed then I am better able to deal with things.
i take too much ritalin. basically 200 mg everyday

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: take in the morning, but still have trouble sleeping at night
Don't take Ritalin on weekends and whenever not needed in order to prevent development of tolerance to its therapeutic effects.

drugs.name: Ritalin

carousel_items_processed.orig: Since it comes in many different forms, there are different requirements for how to take or use each type. Make sure you know how to take the one you have.
Store Ritalin in a locked area to prevent abuse.
Take it early in the morning to prevent insomnia later that night.
It can cause changes in your mood.
Can raise your blood pressure and pulse, so it's not safe for people with heart problems.
Don't take it with alcohol or drugs.

risks_warnings.title: Serious or life-threatening cardiovascular events
risks_warnings.description: Ritalin has been associated with heart attack, stroke, and sudden death. Anyone with a history of heart problems shouldn't take it, and people should be screened for heart problems before starting it. Watch out for unexplained fainting or chest pain that comes on with physical activity.

description_processed.orig: Ritalin has been associated with heart attack, stroke, and sudden death. Anyone with a history of heart problems shouldn't take it, and people should be screened for heart problems before starting it. Watch out for unexplained fainting or chest pain that comes on with physical activity.

risks_warnings.title: Aggressive behavior and psychosis
risks_warnings.description: Taking a stimulant like Ritalin may worsen or bring on psychiatric symptoms such as hallucinations, delusional thinking, and mania. It may also worsen or bring on aggressive behavior or hostility.

description_processed.orig: Taking a stimulant like Ritalin may worsen or bring on psychiatric symptoms such as hallucinations, delusional thinking, and mania. It may also worsen or bring on aggressive behavior or hostility.

risks_warnings.title: Long-term growth suppression
risks_warnings.description: Appetite suppression may occur. In clinical studies, long-term treatment with stimulants similar to Ritalin caused a temporary slowing of growth rate (both height and weight) in children ages seven to ten years. Doctors should monitor children's growth during treatment.

description_processed.orig: Appetite suppression may occur. In clinical studies, long-term treatment with stimulants similar to Ritalin caused a temporary slowing of growth rate (both height and weight) in children ages seven to ten years. Doctors should monitor children's growth during treatment.

risks_warnings.title: Abuse and dependence
risks_warnings.description: Ritalin has a risk of abuse and dependence. Take only what's prescribed by a doctor to minimize risks of abuse and overdose. People with a history of drug abuse shouldn't take it.

description_processed.orig: Ritalin has a risk of abuse and dependence. Take only what's prescribed by a doctor to minimize risks of abuse and overdose. People with a history of drug abuse shouldn't take it.

risks_warnings.title: Seizures
risks_warnings.description: Ritalin has been shown to raise the chances of someone having a seizure if they've had seizures in the past. Talk to your doctor if you've had a history of seizures to see if an alternative should be prescribed instead.

description_processed.orig: Ritalin has been shown to raise the chances of someone having a seizure if they've had seizures in the past. Talk to your doctor if you've had a history of seizures to see if an alternative should be prescribed instead.

risks_warnings.title: Prolonged erection
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Ritalin. This has been rare and usually happened after a person's dose of Ritalin was increased. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Ritalin. This has been rare and usually happened after a person's dose of Ritalin was increased. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

risks_warnings.title: Circulation problems in the hands and feet
risks_warnings.description: People on Ritalin have reported circulation problems in the hands and feet. This has been rare and usually gets better once this medication is stopped. Talk to your doctor if you notice numbness, pain, tingling or a cold feeling in your hands or feet.

description_processed.orig: People on Ritalin have reported circulation problems in the hands and feet. This has been rare and usually gets better once this medication is stopped. Talk to your doctor if you notice numbness, pain, tingling or a cold feeling in your hands or feet.

surveys.question: What tip would you give someone like me who was just diagnosed?
surveys.tip: Find your 'support' person for help w grocery, driving and such.  For now, focus on accepting this new you ~ same heart & soul; just sleepier!! Xo
